metadata.title: CVE-2022-41844 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.04. There is a crash in XRef::fetch(int, int, Object*, int) in xpdf/XRef.cc, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-16369 and CVE-2019-16088.

notes.note: ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
